attributes.action: Stop Boris Johnson becoming prime minister.
attributes.background: We cannot allow Boris Johnson to become prime minister. It is clear he is not to be trusted. He lied in the EU campaign and that was clear to see. He does not care about this country and has had a agenda from day one. Send a message we don't want him. Sign this petition.

rejection.details: The Prime Minister of the UK is not chosen by the UK Government or Parliament.
